participant_1.background:
I have trouble finding shoes that fit my big, six-toed foot.
I miss playing outside with my friends in the summer.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
I practice martial arts regularly to stay in shape and defend myself.
i have a younger sibling.

participant_2.background:
My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.
i like to try different beers from various countries.
I'm of mixed race, but I identify more with my Chinese heritage.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.
i am a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.

content.text: Hi, what's your favorite kind of beer?
I like to try different beers from various countries.  What about you?
I love trying new things, but I'm not a big fan of beer.
I see! What's your favorite drink?
Those are delicious!  What's your favorite fruit to put in a smoothie?
I like to put strawberries, blueberries, and bananas in a smoothie.
That sounds delicious!  I like to put mango and pineapple in my smoothies.
That sounds really good!  I'll have to try that.
I have a weekly laundry routine to keep up with my kids' dirty clothes.  Do you have any kids?
No, I don't have any kids.
Oh, that's good!  Kids are a lot of work!  What do you do for a living?
That's great!  What grade do you teach?
Oh, that must be fun!  I'm sure you love working with kids.
Yes, I do!  I love seeing their excitement when they learn new things.
That's so great!  I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you!  That means a lot
